requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD 3020e with Radeon Graphics (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD 3020e with Radeon Graphics (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game has been tested and run successfully under this specs and at 60 fps without problems. However just a little higher spec make this game run much more smoothly
requirements_en.recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This are the highest spects in which the game has been tested and run successfully, but lower specs should also be able to run it. More precise requirements soon)
